name: Ferienwohnungen Binder
description:
Our house Binder is in a quiet situation, directly in the centre of Mayrhofen. 
All facilities of the place (swimming-pool, Penkenbahn. . . ) you can reach at few walking minutes.
You can cover the flat latest 16. 00 o'clock and we ask you to leave the flat on the departure day till 9. 30 o'clock 
In the price included is stream, water and heating.
Final cleaning is specially settled.
Road description: 
At the roundabout traffic in Mayrhofen drive straight ahead,
turn left after the train station. Then drive to the crossroad and here you go straight ahead. Now with this street fork turn left and at the crossroad straight ahead. Our house is on the left side

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, bath, toilet
makesOffer.description: Kitchen-living room, 2 double bed rooms both with shower and WC, balcony, cable TV, radio. . . . . . . .
